Package com.github.mikkoi.projects_maven_plugin

package com.github.mikkoi.projects_maven_plugin
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddInternalMojo
    Add one or more dependencies into the project.
    BaseMojo
    Base class for Mojos.
    CreateBomMojo
    Create a BOM POM from the current POM.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on projects-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn projects:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    ListMojo
    List all projects in the build.
    MojoUtilities
    Utility methods for Mojos.
